question: The Apex Committee for the Implementation of the Paris Agreement (AIPA) that was recently constituted by the Indian Government to ensure coordinated response on climate change matters was formed under the chairmanship of which ministry?
option4: Union Ministry of Forest and Climate Change
answer: Union Ministry of Forest and Climate Change
explanation: The Apex Committee for the Implementation of the Paris Agreement (AIPA) that was recently constituted by the Indian Government to ensure coordinated response on climate change matters and to keep the country on track towards meeting its climate change obligations under the Paris Agreement, which includes Nationally Determined Contributions (NCDs). The committee was formed under the chairmanship of Union Ministry of Forest and Climate Change Secretary.
